verses.verse: The beginning<WG746> of the gospel<WG2098> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> the Son<WG5207> of God;<WG2316>

As it is written<WG1125> in the prophets,<WG4396> Behold,<WG2400> I send<WG649> my messenger<WG32> before<WG4253> your face,<WG4383> which<WG3739> shall prepare<WG2680> your way<WG3598> before<WG1715> you.
The voice<WG5456> of one crying<WG994> in the wilderness,<WG2048> Prepare<WG2090> you the way<WG3598> of the Lord,<WG2962> make<WG4160> his paths<WG5147> straight.<WG2117>
John<WG2491> did baptize<WG907> in the wilderness,<WG2048> and preach<WG2784> the baptism<WG908> of repentance<WG3341> for the remission<WG859> of sins.<WG266>

And there went<WG1607> out to him all<WG3956> the land<WG5561> of Judaea,<WG2449> and they of Jerusalem,<WG2414> and were all<WG3956> baptized<WG907> of him in the river<WG4215> of Jordan,<WG2446> confessing<WG1843> their sins.<WG266>

And John<WG2491> was clothed<WG1746> with camel's<WG2574> hair,<WG2359> and with a girdle<WG2223> of a skin<WG1193> about<WG4012> his loins;<WG3751> and he did eat<WG2068> locusts<WG200> and wild<WG66> honey;<WG3192>

And preached,<WG2784> saying,<WG3004> There comes<WG2064> one mightier<WG2478> than I after<WG3694> me, the lace<WG2438> of whose<WG3739> shoes<WG5266> I am<WG1510> not worthy<WG2425> to stoop<WG2955> down and unloose.<WG3089>
I indeed<WG3303> have baptized<WG907> you with water:<WG5204> but he shall baptize<WG907> you with the Holy<WG40> Ghost.<WG4151>
And it came<WG1096> to pass in those<WG1565> days,<WG2250> that Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> from Nazareth<WG3478> of Galilee,<WG1056> and was baptized<WG907> of John<WG2491> in Jordan.<WG2446>
And straightway<WG2112> coming<WG305> up out of the water,<WG5204> he saw<WG1492> the heavens<WG3772> opened,<WG4977> and the Spirit<WG4151> like<WG5616> a dove<WG4058> descending<WG2597> on him:
And there came<WG1096> a voice<WG5456> from heaven,<WG3772> saying, You are<WG1488> my beloved<WG27> Son,<WG5207> in whom<WG3739> I am well<WG2106> pleased.<WG2106>
And immediately<WG2117> the spirit<WG4151> drives<WG1544> him into<WG1519> the wilderness.<WG2048>

And he was there<WG1563> in the wilderness<WG2048> forty<WG5062> days,<WG2250> tempted<WG3985> of Satan;<WG4567> and was with the wild<WG2342> beasts;<WG2342> and the angels<WG32> ministered<WG1247> to him.

Now<WG1161> after<WG3326> that John<WG2491> was put<WG3860> in prison,<WG3860> Jesus<WG2424> came<WG2064> into<WG1519> Galilee,<WG1056> preaching<WG2784> the gospel<WG2098> of the kingdom<WG932> of God,<WG2316>
And saying,<WG3004> The time<WG2540> is fulfilled,<WG4137> and the kingdom<WG932> of God<WG2316> is at<WG1448> hand:<WG1448> repent<WG3340> you, and believe <WG4100> <WG1722> the gospel. <WG2098>

Now as he walked<WG4043> by the sea<WG2281> of Galilee,<WG1056> he saw<WG1492> Simon<WG4613> and Andrew<WG406> his brother<WG80> casting<WG906> a net<WG293> into<WG1722> the sea:<WG2281> for they were fishers.<WG231>
And Jesus<WG2424> said<WG2036> to them, Come<WG1205> you after<WG3694> me, and I will make<WG4160> you to become<WG1096> fishers<WG231> of men. <WG444>
And straightway<WG2112> they forsook<WG863> their nets,<WG1350> and followed<WG190> him.

And when he had gone<WG4260> a little<WG3641> farther<WG4260> there,<WG1564> he saw<WG1492> James<WG2385> the son of Zebedee,<WG2199> and John<WG2491> his brother,<WG80> who<WG846> also<WG2532> were in the ship<WG4143> mending<WG2675> their nets.<WG1350>

And straightway<WG2112> he called<WG2564> them: and they left<WG863> their father<WG3962> Zebedee<WG2199> in the ship<WG4143> with the hired<WG3411> servants,<WG3411> and went<WG565> after<WG3694> him.
And they went<WG1531> into<WG1519> Capernaum;<WG2584> and straightway<WG2112> on the sabbath<WG4521> day he entered<WG1525> into<WG1519> the synagogue,<WG4864> and taught.<WG1321>
And they were astonished<WG1605> at<WG1909> his doctrine:<WG1322> for he taught<WG2258> <WG1321> them as one that had<WG2192> authority,<WG1849> and not as the scribes.<WG1122>
And there was in their synagogue<WG4864> a man<WG444> with an unclean<WG169> spirit;<WG4151> and he cried<WG349> out,

Saying,<WG3004> Let<WG1439> us alone;<WG1439> what<WG5101> have we to do with you, you Jesus<WG2424> of Nazareth?<WG3478> are you come<WG2064> to destroy<WG622> us? I know<WG1492> you who<WG5101> you are,<WG1488> the Holy<WG40> One of God.<WG2316>
And Jesus<WG2424> rebuked<WG2008> him, saying,<WG3004> Hold<WG5392> your peace,<WG5392> and come<WG1831> out of him.
And when the unclean<WG169> spirit<WG4151> had torn<WG4682> him, and cried<WG2896> with a loud<WG3173> voice,<WG5456> he came<WG1831> out of him.

And they were all<WG3956> amazed,<WG2284> so<WG5620> that they questioned<WG4802> among<WG4314> themselves,<WG848> saying,<WG3004> What<WG5101> thing is this?<WG3778> what<WG5101> new<WG2537> doctrine<WG1322> is this?<WG5124> for with authority<WG1849> commands<WG2004> he even<WG2532> the unclean<WG169> spirits,<WG4151> and they do obey<WG5219> him.
And immediately<WG2117> his fame<WG189> spread<WG1831> abroad<WG1831> throughout<WG1519> all<WG3650> the region<WG4066> round<WG4066> about<WG4066> Galilee.<WG1056>

And immediately,<WG2112> when they were come<WG1831> out of the synagogue,<WG4864> they entered<WG2064> into<WG1519> the house<WG3614> of Simon<WG4613> and Andrew,<WG406> with James<WG2385> and John.<WG2491>
But Simon's<WG4613> wife's<WG3994> mother<WG3994> lay<WG2621> sick<WG4445> of a fever,<WG4445> and immediately<WG2112> they tell<WG3004> him of her.
And he came<WG4334> and took<WG2902> her by the hand,<WG5495> and lifted<WG1453> her up; and immediately<WG2112> the fever<WG4446> left<WG863> her, and she ministered<WG1247> to them.

And at even,<WG3798> <WG1096> when<WG3753> the sun<WG2246> did set,<WG1416> they brought<WG5342> to him all<WG3956> that were diseased,<WG2560> <WG2192> and them that were possessed<WG1139> with devils.<WG1139>
And all<WG3650> the city<WG4172> was gathered<WG1996> together<WG1996> at<WG4314> the door.<WG2374>

And he healed<WG2323> many<WG4183> that were sick<WG2192> <WG2560> of divers<WG4164> diseases,<WG3554> and cast<WG1544> out many<WG4183> devils;<WG1140> and suffered<WG863> not the devils<WG1140> to speak,<WG2980> because<WG3754> they knew<WG1492> him.

And in the morning,<WG4404> rising<WG450> up a great<WG3029> while before<WG1773> day,<WG1773> he went<WG1831> out, and departed<WG565> into<WG1519> a solitary<WG2048> place,<WG5117> and there<WG1563> prayed.<WG4336>
And Simon<WG4613> and they that were with him followed<WG2614> after<WG2614> him.
And when they had found<WG2147> him, they said<WG3004> to him, All<WG3956> men seek<WG2212> for you.

And he said<WG3004> to them, Let us go<WG71> into<WG1519> the next<WG2192> towns,<WG2969> that I may preach<WG2784> there<WG1563> also:<WG2546> for therefore <WG1519> <WG5124> came<WG1831> I forth. <WG1831>
And he preached<WG2784> in their synagogues<WG4864> throughout<WG1519> all<WG3650> Galilee,<WG1056> and cast<WG1544> out devils.<WG1140>

And there came<WG2064> a leper<WG3015> to him, beseeching<WG3870> him, and kneeling<WG1120> down to him, and saying<WG3004> to him, If<WG1437> you will,<WG2309> you can<WG1410> make<WG2511> me clean.<WG2511>
And Jesus,<WG2424> moved<WG4697> with compassion,<WG4697> put<WG1614> forth<WG1614> his hand,<WG5495> and touched<WG680> him, and said<WG3004> to him, I will;<WG2309> be you clean. <WG2511>
And as soon as he had spoken,<WG2036> immediately<WG2112> the leprosy<WG3014> departed<WG565> from him, and he was cleansed.<WG2511>
And he straightly charged<WG1690> him, and immediately<WG2112> sent<WG1544> him away;<WG1544>

And said<WG3004> to him, See<WG3708> you say<WG2036> nothing<WG3367> to any<WG3367> man:<WG3367> but go<WG5217> your way, show<WG1166> yourself<WG4572> to the priest,<WG2409> and offer<WG4374> for your cleansing<WG2512> those things which<WG3739> Moses<WG3475> commanded,<WG4367> for a testimony<WG3142> to them.

But he went<WG1831> out, and began<WG756> to publish<WG2784> it much,<WG4183> and to blaze<WG1310> abroad<WG1310> the matter,<WG3056> so<WG5620> that Jesus<WG2424> could<WG1410> no<WG3371> more<WG3371> openly<WG5320> enter<WG1525> into<WG1519> the city,<WG4172> but was without<WG1854> in desert<WG2048> places:<WG5117> and they came<WG2064> to him from every<WG3836> quarter.<WG3836>
